attributes.action: honour our fallen heroes of all wars and conflicts by putting more into the cylabus in education across the countryand in england as well as rememberance day we should make plans for a heroes day to coincide with st georges day as a mark of being proud of our country and those who have fallen protecting our shores
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think as well as many other like minded people of today we dont do enough to honour those that have died for there queen country
and we should mark these people lives by way of a special day or occasion to co-inside with st georges day when we can all be proud of our great country
god bless there soles and god save the queen.
